game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact and bring it back to Magdalena
game.description: In a small village located deep in the mountains, a powerful artifact has been stolen. The village elder, Magdalena, seeks a brave adventurer to retrieve the artifact and restore peace to the village. The artifact is said to be hidden in a treacherous cave system. Are you up for the challenge?
game.reward: 200 gold coins and a rare legendary item

task.objective: Find the entrance to the cave system
task.description: The entrance to the cave system is rumored to be near a tall oak tree. Search the forest for the tree and locate the hidden entrance.

task.objective: Survive the traps and monsters in the caves
task.description: The cave system is filled with traps, puzzles, and dangerous creatures. Proceed with caution and use your wit and skills to overcome the challenges.

task.objective: Locate the sacred chamber and retrieve the artifact
task.description: Deep within the cave system lies the sacred chamber where the artifact is kept. Explore the tunnels and chambers until you find the chamber and retrieve the artifact.
Once you have the artifact, make your way back to the village and return it to Magdalena. She will reward you generously for your efforts.
